items.content_html:
Welcome! Here is the demo and documentation for Lume Theme Shiraha.

  • Part 1: Installation
  • Part 2: Writing
items.title: Gettings Started

items.content_html:
It’s time to create your first article!

Here I use lume cli to create the posts, you can also create the files manually.

This will generate ./articles/my-first-article.md:

I assume you already know what Frontmatter is.

Here you can use the Lume Standard Variables and part of the FFF Flavored Frontmatter (depending on the progress of theme development, most will be supported eventually)

For example, to change the generated directory without changing the filename:

That’s it!
items.title: Part 2: Writing

items.content_html:
Setup Deno & Lume

As this is a Lume theme, please follow the Deno installation instructions and Lume documentation to install them first.

Install Lume Theme Shiraha

Now that you should have a basic Lume blog, modify _config.ts to use the Shiraha theme:
items.title: Part 1: Installation
